text: There are 26 shopping malls (including ones for wholesale in Dongdamon) , if you are looking for mid range priced clothes without big brand names, design ranges from casual to smart casual, with average quality that will last maybe 2-3 years, then this mall is for you! There is also tax reduction available so it is very convenient!
Plenty of stuffs and many floors of stuffs. High end but quality was good and very fashionable clothes. Need about 2 to 3 hrs at least.
